str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To raise myself, look up, be elated. From ana and kupto; to unbend, i.e. Rise; figuratively, be elated.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To raise, lift up. From epi and airo; to raise up.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From the primary kapto; the head, literally or figuratively.
On this account, because, for. From dia and hoti; on the very account that, or inasmuch as.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From a compound of apo and lutron; ransom in full, i.e. riddance, or Christian salvation.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Trans: I bring near; intrans: I come near, approach. From eggus; to make near, i.e. approach.
